name: Linktagger
overview:
LinkTagger is a dynamic QR Code management platform that allows the creation and real-time management of dynamic QR Codes.

LinkTagger calls their QR Codes Linktags which are effectively different QR data types. They range from simple http links to App Store links, social media links, file uploads and hosted web pages among others.

LinkTagger is aimed at any user however boasts enterprise level support with its secure linktags and managed API integration.
